entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dalhousie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 09:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
